Point and shoot to stardom

12 Jun 2007

Update: We're also the #5 most-viewed Channel on ALL OF YOUTUBE today. Craziness!

So, I'm the #1 viewed comedian on YouTube today (well, technically, Planet Nerd is). Which sketch was it, do you think? The hilarious iPhone sketch? Karin Muiznieks' touching song that just does add up?

Nope. It's a video of John Carmack talking about the next-generation ID graphics engine.

38,000 views and counting. Go Carmack! That guy is the biggest nerd ever.

Click below if you don't believe me.
